item.title: How to Implement SafetyNet Attestation in Your Application
item.description: This post is just a collection of information about how to implement SafetyNet Attestation API in your application. This whole thing started weeks ago after my team was researching a way to block suspicious requests that were occurring in our authentication API. There were lots of different users trying to log in, from different IP addresses/ranges. We already had a WAF set up, however, in this scenario, this was not effective.
